MSG_SAVE_ASK_FILE: Name of the save game? (Enter exit to close and press enter for default name)
MSG_SAVE_OVR_FILE: Do you want to override this file? (Y/N)
MSG_LOAD_ASK_FILE: What file do you want to load? (Enter exit to close and press enter to load default)
MSG_LOAD_FILE_NOT_FOUNT: Filename not found! Pls try again.
MSG_HELP:
Available Commands:
1. Save
2. Load
3. Exit
4. Help
5. Talk
6. Search
7. Use
8. Go
9. Leave
MSG_TALK_RESPONSE_CHOICE: What do you want to answer?
MSG_EVENT_ID_NOT_PRESENT: Event is not supported in this instance
